Name: C
Author: Dennis Ritchie
History: Published: 1978,It was created in the 1970s by Dennis Ritchie
About: In 1978, Brian Kernighan and Dennis Ritchie published the first edition of The C Programming Language.

Name: C++
Author: Bjarne Stroustrup
History: Published: 1985,1985: The first official reference guide for the C++ programming language is published.
About: C++ is a cross-platform language that can be used to create high-performance applications.

Name: Python
Author: Guido Von Rossum
History: Published: 1991: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Python is dynamically-typed and garbage-collected.
About: It supports multiple programming paradigms, including structured, object-oriented and functional programming.
